name: Forest Lines Adventure
description:
You will love this game if you like match 3 puzzle games and casual match-3 games.

The game is free and will give you a lot of pleasant minutes. Relax with nice graphics and music while solving simple puzzles in stunning match-3 levels!

The game is waiting for you:

• Exciting levels in the match 3 genre, where you will be required ingenuity or quick reaction.

• Juicy graphics

• Nice music against the background of sounds of nature.

• Two game modes: "Passage" and "Survival".

The main goal of the game is to remove the maximum number of characters that disappear when lining up identical units of 3 or more in a row (horizontally, vertically or diagonally).

In the passage mode, you will have your own tasks that need to be solved using maximum ingenuity or reaction speed.

In the "Survival" mode, you need to hold out as long as possible until the field is completely filled and score the maximum number of points.

Download my match 3 game and enjoy it all day!

 If you have any questions or suggestions, be sure to write to me at melnikov0220@gmail.com

Be the first with your ideas and I will definitely include them in the game in the next updates.
